This test exercises the caseSensitive completion matcher.

-- flags --
-ignore_extra_diags

-- settings.json --
{
	"completeUnimported": false,
	"matcher": "caseSensitive"
}

-- casesensitive.go --
package casesensitive

func _() {
	var lower int //@item(lower, "lower", "int", "var")
	var Upper int //@item(upper, "Upper", "int", "var")

	l //@complete(re"() \\/\\/", lower)
	U //@complete(re"() \\/\\/", upper)

	L //@complete(re"() \\/\\/")
	u //@complete(re"() \\/\\/")
}
